devdoc.details: A contract that includes helper functions for the Kyber protocol.

getTicks(address,uint256).details: The function gets the current state of the pool and fetches the ticks by moving in both directions (previous and next) from the current tick. The number of fetched ticks is limited by `maxTickNum`.

params.maxTickNum: The maximum number of ticks to fetch.
params.pool: The address of the Kyber pool to fetch the ticks from.

returns.ticks: The bytes array containing the fetched ticks data.

devdoc.title: KyberHelper

getTicks(address,uint256).notice: Fetches initialized ticks from a given Kyber pool.
